name: Woods Lights
description:
A treasure is hidden, collect clues and
complete your card to get it back!
But be careful, you are not alone.


Woodlights is an exploration game for 2 players.
It takes place on a grid, on which the players will be able
move freely and place a lantern, which serves as
displacement marker each turn when placed on
a box. A treasure is hidden on the grid at a position which is
unknown to players.
The goal of each player is to find this treasure by moving
his lantern on the grid to reveal the box where he is hidden.
For this purpose, they will have cards that will give them
clues to the position of this treasure, as well as traps they
can put on the grid to recover or steal
information to their opponent.
